channel.title: Organize Anything
channel.description: Organizing solutions for your office, home, and self - reduce stress, increase productivity and gain an improved sense of control and well being.

item.title: Beauty of a Minimalist Holiday
item.description: You are less stressed, you can spend more time enjoying time with your family instead of running around trying to get everything. Your family will agree that a minimalist holiday will make you a more relaxed and fun person to be around.

item.title: Podcast 1: Professional Organizer is a Generalist and Makes Projects Manageable
item.description: Organizer and Coach, Colette Robicheau of Organize Anything talks about finding her passion in the organizing business, coming from a marketing and consulting background. She also discusses time management and breaking down projects into manageable tasks. She gives tips on avoiding procrastination, and how to look at the solution fits and resonates with you.
